item.title: Welcome to PlayStation Home
item.description:
1. YES. MOAR FREEBIES! Check out the Free Item Giveaway tab in the Navigator for Volume #4! Highlighting this weekâ€™s release is the Infinite Oasis Ranch Mega Bundle! With that many words in the title, you know this personal space/clubhouse combo (with matching furniture) is going to be awesome!
2. Another star-studded Spotlight story to tell! What will become of our beloved Director? Will the Junk Guy seek medical attention? Who is Nurse Sharome? Find all these answers and more this week in the PSTalent Theater, where the community takes the stage!
3. The Home team will be out of the office for the next week and a half for the holiday break. Our next (and final) batch of free items will land on January 7. Happy Holidays, and have a safe and wonderful New Year!
